1 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
  2 //		Implement queuable getter setter				//
  3 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
  4 
  5 /**
  6  * by default __defineGetter__ support only one function. Same for __defineSetter
  7  * This is a annoying limitation. This little library declares 2 functions
  8  * Object.__defineQGetter__ and Object.__defineQGetter__.
  9  * They behave the same as their native sibling but support multiple functions.
 10  * Those functions are called in the same order they got registered.
 11  * 
 12  * (I have no idea of the reasoning behind this limitation to one function. It seems
 13  *  useless to me. This remind me of onclick of the DOM instead of a proper .addEventListener) 
 14 */
 15 (function(){
 16 	/**
 17 	 * Class to implement queueable getter/setter
 18 	 * @param  {Object} baseObject The base object on which we operate
 19 	 * @param  {String} property   The string of property
 20 	 */
 21 	var _QueuableGetterSetter	= function(baseObject, property){
 22 		// sanity check 
 23 		console.assert( typeof(baseObject) === 'object' );
 24 		console.assert( typeof(property) === 'string' );
 25 		// backup the initial value
 26 		var initialValue= baseObject[property];
 27 		// init some local variables
 28 		var _this	= this;
 29 		this._getters	= [];
 30 		this._setters	= [];
 31 		// define the root getter
 32 		baseObject.__defineGetter__(property, function(){
 33 			var value	= baseObject['__'+property];
 34 			for(var i = 0; i < _this._getters.length; i++){
 35 				value	= _this._getters[i](value)
 36 			}
 37 			return value;
 38 		});
 39 		// define the root setter		
 40 		baseObject.__defineSetter__(property, function(value){
 41 			for(var i = 0; i < _this._setters.length; i++){
 42 				value	= _this._setters[i](value)
 43 			}
 44 			baseObject['__'+property] = value;
 45 		});
 46 		// set the initialValue
 47 		baseObject['__'+property]	= initialValue;
 48 	};
 49 	
 50 	//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 51 	// Override prototype of global ```Object```
 52 	Object.prototype.__defineQGetter__	= function(property, getterFn){
 53 		var name	= "__dbgGetSet_" + property;
 54 		// init _QueuableGetterSetter for this property if needed
 55 		this[name]	= this[name] || new _QueuableGetterSetter(this, property);
 56 		// setup the new getter
 57 		this[name]._getters.push(getterFn)
 58 	};
 59 	
 60 	Object.prototype.__defineQSetter__	= function(property, setterFn){
 61 		var name	= "__dbgGetSet_" + property;
 62 		// init _QueuableGetterSetter for this property if needed
 63 		this[name]	= this[name] || new _QueuableGetterSetter(this, property);
 64 		// setup the new setter
 65 		this[name]._setters.push(setterFn)
 66 	};
 67 })();
 68 
 69
